meanings.definition: To place cremated remains in an urn.
meanings.sent1: After the cremation, we will be inurning the ashes in a beautiful urn.
meanings.sent2: Families often choose to inurn the ashes of their loved ones as a way to honor their memory.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was inurning its favorite toy in the shoebox.
meanings.sent4: Inurning the memories of childhood in a small box brought a sense of closure.
meanings.sent5: Inurning the precious memories in a safe place helped keep them close.

meanings.definition: The act of placing cremated remains in an urn.
meanings.sent1: The inurning of the ashes was a solemn moment for the family.
meanings.sent2: The inurning ceremony was held in a peaceful garden.
meanings.sent3: The inurning process seemed like a special ritual to honor the departed.
meanings.sent4: The inurning of the ashes symbolized the beginning of healing for the family.
meanings.sent5: The inurning of the remains brought a sense of closure and peace to all.
